word_mean: 由扫海部分、定深部分和拖带部分，或由底杆、定深杆和固定索组成，被船舶拖曳进行扫海测量的工具。

entry.def: In football, a sweeper is a player whose position is behind the main defenders but in front of the goalkeeper.

means.word_mean: 1. an employee who sweeps (floors or streets etc.)
2. a cleaning device with revolving brushes that pick up dirt as the device is pushed over a carpet
3. little-known nocturnal fish of warm shallow seas with an oblong compressed body
